Articles.Content:
So I have started working a rover, trying to hit the design of the Mars rover Curiosity, although I think I hit a problem and I am not too sure how to solve it. Curiosity was sort of "packed" into a capsule as far as I remember, but how would I go and do this in KSP? I am rather new to the game and especially rovers, so please excuse if this is an obviously dull question

Kind regards,

thoose

First off welcome to the forums Secondly could we see a picture of your rover to help us give you advice? There are a couple of options for you... You could download a payload fairing mod (KW Rocketry is probably the best IMO) and pack it into that, or you could try making one yourself with the grey structural pieces.
You might also find the fairing factory to be quite useful here too
